message: I have a great opportunity for you to invest in a high-value product. I'm willing to let it go for $10000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I can do $9500, and that's as low as I can go.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me there?
